Articles.Content:
attaches giant rockets to hoth.

\*hoth falls into the sun\*

\*builds new hill on kerbin\*

\*hires jeb\*

My hill defended by jeb.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-08T15:37:41Z" title="09/08/2015 03:37  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 8, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**
I blow up the planet with the hill using a Death Star and then I find a new hill on another planet. My hill.
I make a hill and shield it in a dyson sphere in a dyson sphere in a dyson sphere. My hill. And then defend it with a UNSC fleet.
I drop another hill in your hill. My taller hill.
I shoot your hill with my MAC cannon array.
You forgot to claim the hill. Still my hill.

I shoot the hill and destroy it, therefore it is no longer a hill and my people are still in the 3x Dyson sphere with the UNSC fleet guarding it. So it's nobody's hill becasue it doesnt exist. And also Jeb is the commander of the UNSC fleet.
I build a hill and plant a flag on it with my profile picture. My hill.
I keep destroying your hills. My hill(s).
I fart so loud and with a stench so,great that everyone on your hill dies! My hill!
I blow away the stench using the wind generated by a helicopter and then I land on top of you. My hill.

Uses a KK gatling gun that fires depleted uranium slugs at 99.999%c at the UNSC fleet, the dyson spheres, and milkeman.

my hill defended by a KK gatling gun.

also, don't drop any bombs because I will blow them up with my KK gatling gun.

I send 20 impactor probes into the hill at Mach 20.

My hill not defended by KK gatling gun.
I dig a tunnel and attack from below. My hill.

You'll have to do much better than that. the Gatling gun has an onboard AI that has a ridiculously fast response time.

still my hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-13T18:15:50Z" title="09/13/2015 06:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 13, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**

I use an Alcubierre drive to crash thermonuclear devices into the hill.

My hill, now with 15 UNSC fleets, orbital MAC turrets, a few dozen Covenant fleets, and a Forerunner fleet. Also defended by all of the SPARTAN-IVs in existence.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-13T19:24:40Z" title="09/13/2015 07:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 13, 2015</time> by legoclone09**
  
Fixed typo
I nuke the hill. My hill.

That must have been a very big nuke.

i take the hill by force as you forgot to place any defensive measures.

my hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-14T16:37:36Z" title="09/14/2015 04:37  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 14, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**

i strike your hill with my CFA-44 ADMM

 my hill with railguns, AA defenses and lasers
I strike your hill with my wave motion gun. My hill, with a space battleship yamato guarding it, and a squadron of the black tigers flying overhead.
I redirect an asteroid to hit the hill, and then I rebuild the hill on the resulting crater. My hill.

i take the hill because of the lack of defenses.

my hill.

It take the hill from lack of defences and add land mines

my hill

i jump from a plane and land on you.

i add a laser cannon.

my hill with land mines and a laser cannon.

sv\_edit\_lasercannon\_and\_landmine

My computerized hill.
